tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My girlfriend and I visited Dr Gurmeet Bansal as my girlfriend was under a lot of pain due to an infection in her private area. When we met the doctor, she greeted us very well and instantly jumped to the conclusion that we are married as she asked my girlfriend for ‘how long we have been married?’. We honestly told her that we are not married. **** **** **** ******* ** ***** ***** * ********* ** *** **** ******* ** *** ****** ** ***** But what really made our experience sour was when we asked her if she accepted payment through online mediums or debit card. She said they only accept cash. I had the prescription in my hand and told her that I will go to the ATM and just get back. To which, Dr Gurmeet Singh forcibly took the prescription from my hand and asked us to first get the money and pay her fees. We felt really awkward and insulted. This kind of crass behaviour is not expected *** ** * ******* **** *** *********** ** ******* ****** ***** *** ***** ******** ** **** **** *** ******** *** ** ****** ************ **** *** ********* *** *** ***** Later we consulted another Gynaecologist *** *** ********* ******** *********** *** ****************  *** **** * **** ********* *** ****** ** **** ****** ********** *** ********* ***** *** ********** ******** ** *** *** *** **** *** ******* ** ** ******* ******* Hence, we would NOT recommend Dr Gurmeet Bansal at all.

I went to consult doctor within weak since I had not to pay fee. But doctor told me that if she examine my physique then I would have to pay fee .I  asked her if she accepted payment through online mediums or debit card. She said they only accept cash. I had the prescription in my hand and told her that I will go to the ATM and just get back. To which, Dr Gurmeet Singh forcibly took the prescription from my hand and asked us to first get the money and pay her fees. We felt really awkward and insulted. This kind of ***** behaviour is not expected
